learn_buttons.title: Learn Controller Buttons
learn_buttons.description:
Learn the button commands for your {controller_type} controller at ID location {id_location}.

**Step {button_number} of {total_buttons}: Learn {button_name}**

Progress: {learned_count}/{total_buttons} buttons learned

**Instructions:**
1. Press and hold the **P3 button** on your existing remote control
2. Wait for the controller to beep (within 5 seconds)
3. Click **Learn Button** below immediately after the beep
4. Wait for confirmation, then proceed to the next button

If you don't need this button, you can skip it.
